front.title: IEEE Guide for Grip Test Method for Fittings of High-Temperature, Low-Sag Overhead Conductor Under Tension and Electric Current Co-Effect
front.abstract: Introduced in this guide is the grip test method for fittings of high-temperature, low-sag overhead conductor with long-term operating temperature of between 90 °C and 250 °C in the coeffect of the tension and the current.
